Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides groups and activities for the local community. Activities include, self-defence classes, computers and online courses, men and women only empowerment groups, enterprise development, a dry pub and regular drop-in sessions. As well as various keep-fit sessions, including women-only and older people's sessions. Facilities include a sensory room. Company limited by guarantee no 06504047.

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 3
